trends: There have been 11 other sightings in Cambridge
There were no other sightings in Cambridge on or around April 1st 2009
divs: Sighting DetailsStanding outside waiting for my daughter's singing lesson to be done at a private home. Very quiet neighborhood on a hill. Listening to evening bird calls, very quiet. Object was luminous and orb shaped. Came over the house across the street (to the North)and passed overhead without a sound and continued towards the South. Straight trajectory, very slow moving, silent. I watched until it disappeared from my view behind another house. There were no wings, blades, or protuberances, and it did not change shape or color. It was not a lantern or a helicopter (in my opinion). Waited for another 20 minutes but it did not return.
Summary: Spherical object, silent, passed directlly overhead at 500'.
